Accept emergency mission?
When accepting an emergency mission, your progress since the last checkpoint is lost. Also, the mission in progress must be restarted from the beginning.

Abort emergency mission?
If you abort an emergency mission, it will no longer be available.

You have signed out. You will not be able to use online features.
*You will not be able to use GMP or resources stored in your online inventory. Connect online again to access your online inventory.

As you have not agreed to the Terms of Use, you will not be able to use online features such as uploading rankings or records. You must agree to the Terms of Use in order to use online features.

You cannot use this feature because you are in offline mode.

Failed to log in to server. You will not be able to use online features.

The server is undergoing maintenance. You will not be able to use online features such as uploading rankings or records. Game will begin in offline mode.
For maintenance information, visit the official game website.
*You will not be able to use GMP or resources stored in your online inventory. Connect online again to access your online inventory.

Online services have concluded. You will not be able to use online features such as uploading rankings or records. Game will begin in offline mode.
For further information, visit the official game website.
*You will not be able to use GMP or resources stored in your online inventory. Connect online again to access your online inventory.

Equip the Chicken Hat? If you use the Chicken Hat, enemies will not detect you even if you enter their field of vision (up to three times), but it will limit your mission completion rank to an A or below. The Chicken Hat can be turned on/off under Options in the Pause menu.

Unable to use this feature since you are in offline mode.
To switch to online mode, select CONNECT ONLINE from the Pause menu.

Deploy to FOB for training?
The FOB will not take any damage during training. Also, you will not incur costs for equipment used.

Quiet recovered and has been discharged from sickbay.

Weapon ammunition/suppressors and consumable items cannot be resupplied if you lack the necessary resources, or they have not been developed at Mother Base. Request supply drop anyway?
Downloadable content has been added. [%s] is now available for development.

Downloadable content has been added. [Mother Base Staff] can now join your unit.
These staff will gradually join your unit as you progress through the game.
Downloadable content has been added. Emblem part [%s] is now available.
Downloadable content has been deleted. [%s]
Downloadable content has been deleted. [Mother Base Staff] can no longer join your unit.

Downloadable content has been deleted. Emblem part [%s] is no longer available.
If this part was in use, your emblem will revert to its default status.
Save data transferred. [%s] is now available for development.

Save data transferred. [Mother Base Staff] can now join your unit.
These staff will gradually join your unit as you progress through the game.
To view the Web Manual, use a browser to access the official website (http://www.konami.jp/mgs5/) and select "Manual."
Reduced Time features cannot be used in offline mode.
Cannot be developed as requirements have not been met. [%s %s] must be developed first.
This tool is already upgraded to its maximum ability. (Tools cannot be downgraded.)
You have already completed this SIDE OP.
You are currently in a mission. Complete this SIDE OP during free roam.

Move to this SIDE OP location?
This will assign all staff in the Waiting Room to the units that suit them best. Proceed?
This will reassign all staff to the units that suit them best. Proceed?
Staff cannot be fired or dispatched while quarantine is in effect.
This FOB is operating with a nuclear deterrent. A great deal of Heroism is required to infiltrate it.
Save data has been rebuilt.
Confirming your selection. If you choose not to rebuild data, previous server data will be deleted. Are you sure?
Confirming your selection. Are you sure you want to rebuild save data using previous data? *Not all data may be recovered.

There is previous Mother Base data for this account on the server. Rebuild save data using previous data? *Not all data may be recovered. *If you choose not to rebuild data, previous server data will be deleted.
Exchange points for rewards?
Equip new items at the Sortie Prep screen.
This will reassign all staff to the units that suit them best.
This will assign all staff in the Waiting Room to the units that suit them best.

Certain types of ammo/suppressors or items may not be included in the supply drop due to a lack of necessary resources. Request supply drop?

You have received an invitation to play METAL GEAR ONLINE, but you cannot accept until you finish your current FOB Mission.

Abort emergency mission?
If you abort an emergency mission, it will no longer be available. *Espionage Points will be decreased.

Abort FOB mission? FOB mission will be considered lost.
*A retaliatory wormhole of the infiltrated FOB will open.
Invitations can not be accepted with this version.
